name: Spacebender Sam
description:
SPACEBENDER SAM

A new perspective on platforming.

Join Sam in his adventure to a factory that is falling apart...literally! Use Sam's Spacebending abilities to traverse the world and solve the puzzles within.

Spacebending is an innovative new mechanic where connections are made from your perspective. Using this ability, you will delve deeper into the factory and find the broken Spatial Stabilizer and mend the space! However, there are more obstacles than your perspective, with enemies and broken equipment hindering your progress.

Spacebending, it's all about perspective!
